glsa.title: DenyHosts: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in DenyHosts could allow a remote attacker to create a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: DenyHosts is a script intended to be run by Linux system administrators to help thwart SSH server attacks.

description.p: DenyHosts does not properly define the regular expressions used when parsing SSH authentication logs.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition via a crafted login name.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All DenyHost users should upgrade to the latest version:
